metadata.Title: CVE-2010-5105 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: The undo save quit routine in the kernel in Blender 2.5, 2.63a, and earlier allows local users to overwrite arbitrary files via a symlink attack on the quit.blend temporary file.  NOTE: this issue might be a regression of CVE-2008-1103.

notes.Note: sbeattie> according to debian report, 2.49.2~dfsg-1 is not affected should be mitigated by yama tmp hardening

criterions.comment: blender package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
